select count(*) from pg_tables where tablename = '_general' and schemaname = '_global'
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
select id from _roles where name = 'Admin' and password = '5f4dcc3b5aa765d61d8327deb882cf99' limit 1;
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select c.relname as name, obj_description(c.oid, 'pg_class') as description from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_'  order by c.oid
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select count(*) from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_'

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'account' limit 1

create table "account" (id serial primary key  , "A" text  , "B" text ); grant select on table "account" to anonymous; comment on table "account" is 'test model'; comment on column "account".id is 'ID';comment on column "account"."A" is 'a';comment on column "account"."B" is 'b';
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;

select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relkind in ('r','') and n.nspname = 'tester' and pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) and substr(c.relname,1,1) <> '_' and c.relname = 'account' limit 1

select a.attname as name, pg_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod) as type, col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum) as "label", (select pg_catalog.pg_get_expr(d.adbin, d.adrelid) from pg_catalog.pg_attrdef d where d.adrelid = a.attrelid and d.adnum = a.attnum and a.atthasdef) as "default", (select con.conname from pg_catalog.pg_constraint con where con.conrelid=a.attrelid and con.contype='u' and array_upper(con.conkey,1)=1 and con.conkey[1]=a.attnum) as "unique", a.attnotnull as not_null from pg_catalog.pg_attribute a where a.attnum > 0 and not a.attisdropped and a.attname <> 'id' and a.attname = 'A'  and a.attrelid = (select c.oid from pg_catalog.pg_class c left join pg_catalog.pg_namespace n on n.oid = c.relnamespace where c.relname ='account' and n.nspname = 'tester') order by a.attnum
select nspname from pg_namespace where nspname = 'tester' limit 1;
